description: Try our easy to follow Chargrilled Lamb Cutlets & Eggplant With Red Cabbage Slaw recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chargrilled Lamb Cutlets & Eggplant With Red Cabbage Slaw
name: Chargrilled Lamb Cutlets & Eggplant With Red Cabbage Slaw Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, finely slice or shred the red cabbage. Put the cabbage in a bowl, and add the remaining slaw ingredients. Season with salt and black pepper, toss gently, and serve with the lamb cutlets and chargrilled eggplant.
